questions.question: What is the value of π (pi) correct to two decimal places?
questions.explanation: The value of π (pi) correct to two decimal places is 3.14.

questions.question: What is the square root of 64?
What is the equation of a line in slope-intercept form?
questions.explanation: The equation of a line in slope-intercept form is y = mx + c.

questions.question: What is the value of 9 factorial (9!)?
What is the area of a square with side length 5 units?
questions.explanation: The area of a square with side length 5 units is 25 square units.

questions.question: What is the value of 3 to the power of 4 (3⁴)?
questions.explanation: The value of 3 to the power of 4 (3⁴) is 64.

questions.question: What is the sum of the angles in a triangle?
questions.explanation: The sum of the angles in a triangle is 180 degrees.
